org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser

Class SirenQParserPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.search.QParserPlugin
      • org.sindice.siren.solr.qparser.SirenQParserPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware, org.apache.solr.util.plugin.NamedListInitializedPlugin
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonQParserPlugin, KeywordQParserPlugin

    public abstract class SirenQParserPlugin
extends org.apache.solr.search.QParserPlugin
implements org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoaderAware
    Abstract class for SIREn's QParser plugin. In charge of creating a SIREn query from the input value.

    All of the following options may be configured for this plugin in the solrconfig as defaults:

    • qnames - The name of the file containing the qnames mapping for use in the KeywordQueryParser.

      • loadQNamesFile

        protected void loadQNamesFile(org.apache.lucene.analysis.util.ResourceLoader loader)
        Load QNames mapping from the properties file

        The mapping file contains lines such as:

        • foaf=http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/
        which means that the qname foaf:name will be expanded to http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/name.
